resources.string: Click to see another curious fact
Ants stretch when they wake up in the morning
Ostriches can run faster than horses
The gold medals from the Olympic Games are made of silver
You were born with 300 bones, but by adulthood have only 206
It takes about 8 minutes to reach the sunlight to earth
Some bamboo plants can grow up to a meter a day
The state of Florida is bigger than England
Some penguins can jump 2-3 feet above the water down
On average it takes 66 days to make a new habit
Mammoths were following walking on earth in the days when the great pyramids were built
